title: Dell COSI Driver Configuration Schema
description: this file contains JSON schema for Dell COSI Driver Configuration file

connections.description: List of connections to object storage platforms that can be used for object storage provisioning.

objectscale.description: Configuration specific to the ObjectScale platform

id.description: Default, unique identifier for the single connection.

mgmt-endpoint.description: Endpoint of the ObjectScale VDC Management Internal service
mgmt-endpoint.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

namespace.description: Namespace associated with the user/tenant that is allowed to access the bucket
namespace.$comment: This is one of the most confusing things in ObjectScale - it is ID of account, not the namespace! We need to find a way to consistently name it and forward our feedback to the OBS team.

region.description: Identity and Access Management (IAM) API specific field, points to the region in which object storage provider is installed

emptyBucket.description: Indicates if the contents of the bucket should be emptied as part of the deletion process

configuration.description: Configuration for single connection to object storage platform that is used for object storage provisioning

credentials.description: Credentials used for authentication to object storage provider

endpoint.description: Endpoint of the ObjectStore S3 service
endpoint.$comment: format field is placed here only for documentation purposes

insecure.description: Controls whether a client verifies the server's certificate chain and host name

client-cert.description: Base64 encoded content of the clients's certificate file

client-key.description: Base64 encoded content of the clients's key certificate file

root-cas.description: Base64 encoded content of the root certificate authority file
